p: The essential oil was extracted from fresh leaves of A. polystachya (500 g) ground in a knife mill by steam distillation carried out using a Clevenger-type apparatus for 4 h [ 55]. Thereafter, the hydrolate was subjected to liquid-liquid partition in a separatory funnel and three washes with three 10 mL portions of dichloromethane. The essential oil sample was stored at −4 °C until further chemical and biological tests.
